code: import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{CartContext}from'../CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Payments(){const[status,setStatus]=useState('nieopłacone');const[cartItems,,,products]=useContext(CartContext);const handlePayment=()=>{fetch('http://localhost:3001/payments',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({cartItems,products})}).then(response=>response.text()).then(data=>setStatus(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error processing payment:',error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"P\u0142atno\u015Bci"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePayment,children:"Zap\u0142a\u0107 teraz"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",status]})]});}export default Payments;
